edge_1: Challenges T'Challa to ritual combat, where he kills Zuri; without the powers of the heart-shaped herb, T'Challa is badly injured and thought dead after Killmonger hurls him over a waterfall.

edge_1: Fighting in Wakanda's vibranium mine, T'Challa disrupts Killmonger's suit and stabs him.
edge_2: Meanwhile, Killmonger kills Klaue and takes his body to Wakanda. He is brought before the tribal elders, revealing his identity as N'Jadaka and stating his claim to the throne.
